page.title: 01Liverpool,Newsham _ General
page.content: The area is mostly housing, from Victorian to 1960's. Proportion of open accessible space, high. Since 1960's railway_based distributive and wholesale trades have largely disappeared. Government and private finance have created Wavertree Technology Park. Existing major employer in area: Plessey Telecommunications. Nature of local population stable. Having had minimal influx of racial minorities the area is ethnically almost homogeneous, in the main artisan class, a high proportion of which are owner occupiers.
